name: AVIATION TECHNICAL SCHOOL OF COTABATO
about: The Aviation Technical School of Cotabato (ATSC), founded in 2013 by Engr. Michael M. Mustapha, MBA, is the first and only aviation school in Cotabato City. ATSC is uniquely managed by a Muslim in the Republic of the Philippines. The school offers comprehensive aviation training, catering to the growing demand for skilled aviation professionals. With a focus on quality education and practical training, ATSC prepares students for successful careers in the aviation industry, ensuring they are well-equipped to meet the standards of the global aviation sector. ATSC is committed to providing top-notch training and fostering a community of skilled and dedicated aviation professionals.
services: ["ASSOCIATE IN AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE TECHNOLOGY\nBACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE TECHNOLOGY\nBACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN AERONAUTICAL ENGINEERING"]
